isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CATERPILLAR C-10 AND C-12 ENGINES - OPERATION - Coolant Level Sensor

svcproc.title: Coolant Level Sensor
svcproc.para: The coolant level sensor (1015) is a fluid-level-actuated switch that senses continuity through the fluid to provide a warning when coolant is being lost. It is mounted in the coolant surge tank.
The coolant level switch connects to a 4-pin connector (1015) on the International engine harness. Both circuits go through the engine harness to connector (1014).
